product_name: Skratch Labs Exercise Hydration Mix - Single Serving
long_description: Use the Exercise Hydration Mix to optimize hydration, whether cycling, running, skiing-in fact, whenever you're sweating. All-natural ingredients you can actually pronounce offer real fruit flavor, light and clean taste, less calories and more electrolytes. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
